review: Missed the part where it has to have a separate power supply. Not sure I would have got it instead of the actual Amazon TV box. Otherwise it works great, however don't use a phone charger for the power supply, it was making my Fire Stick overheat and it kept resetting. Otherwise, it's just like any other thing that makes internet go on your TV.4 stars is enough.
author: Gregory Fairbanks Jr.

review: This was everything I expected and more. With just internet services, there is so many things I can use the Fire TV Stick for. I would definitely recommend this item!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great! Faster than other online devices we have used in past.
author: david benthall

review: Got for kids room. Perfect for our needs
author: aarondog

review: I have an Apple TV and this is by far better.  I plan on getting a Fire TV eventually spreading them throughout my house and getting rid of the high priced cable bill... Netflix, Amazon Prime, and look forward to trying Sling TV.
author: Brian Myers

review: We have been very happy with the Fire TV Stick. It was simple to install and has been easy to operate
author: Cheryl Rucker

review: Plug and Play. Very well packaged and arrived fast. Want simple? get the Fire TV Stick.
author: Hector De La Torre

review: Better than expected. And I expect a lot from Amazon products.
author: J. Payne "Jbighitter"

review: Everything and more from what I expected.
author: Julio Aguilar
